snippet: “Documents of 20th-Century Latin American and Latino Art,” a new database, offers online access to a trove of valuable materials.
abstract: Museum of Fine Arts, Houston, introduces Documents of 20th-Century Latin American and Latino Art, a free database that offers online access to a huge trove of valuable historical materials from an understudied field in art.
lead_paragraph: “Documents of 20th-Century Latin American and Latino Art,” a new database, offers online access to a trove of valuable materials.

headline.seo: A New Database Explores Latin American Art
headline.main: Rescuing the Stories Behind Latino Art
headline.print_headline: Rescuing the Stories Behind Latino Art

keywords.value: International Center for the Arts of the Americas
keywords.name: organizations
